title.rendered: ABC Scoop: Spinoffs, Revivals, Farewells and More!

content.rendered:
Scandal is coming to an end.

Roseanne is coming back into our lives.

And so much more!

Click around below for a rundown of all the announcements ABC has made in regard to its 2017-2018 schedule…
